body.name: JAIOT Indoor Plug-in Camera, 2.4GHz Pet/Baby/Nanny Camera with Phone App, 1080P Cameras for Home Security, Color Night Vision, Motion Detection, Easy Set Up, 2-Way Audio, Work w/Alexa
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 51 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 17 hrs 21 mins
features: 【24/7 Live Stream & Color Night Vision】Check in anytime and stay connected with your loved ones from anywhere. This baby/pet camera is equipped with 2 850nm IR lights which enables this wifi camera to switch to night vision mode when the environment is dimmed. To add color to video for enhanced clarity in low light, two spotlights will help illuminate the area for a better view.

【Motion Detection & Real-Time Alerts】This camera indoor wireless can instantly detect motion and send you real-time alerts directly to your phone. The indoor camera with audio can trigger sound and light alarms to frighten away unwanted visitors when the motion is detected. Plus, you can set up and customize motion detection zones to help you detect motion in the areas that matter most.

【Secure Storage is Vital】Store your footage securely with a micro SD card up to 256GB (not included) or in the cloud(14-day free trial). Cloud storage is convenient and adds a backup layer if something happens to your camera( theft or damage).

【Multi-users Shared & Works with Alexa】Share access to your camera with multiple users (no limit) to keep everyone in the loop and ensure nothing goes unnoticed. The indoor camera is compatible with Alexa. You can ask your Echo Show to show you the living room, and with two-way audio, tell your pet sitter about your dog's unique characteristics when needed.

【Set up is a breeze】This plug-in Wi-Fi camera works with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi only (5G Wi-Fi is not supported). Power up your camera, and then finish network configuration via iSeeHome app in just 1 minute. You can place the camera indoor on a tabletop or mount it on the wall, and adjust it towards any direction( 90° left & right, 135° straightly up and down) for your choice.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WIRED · COLOR NIGHT VISION · APP CONTROL
With its 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connectivity, this indoor security camera can be easily controlled via user-friendly phone app iSeeHome.

Visibility at your fingertips See it. Control it. From anywhere Whether you are at work , or walking the dog, or on vacation, this little indoor security camera allows you to keep an eye on your home from anywhere with just a few taps on your smartphone.

Three Night Vision Modes to Choose From Infrared mode : only display black and white imagesFull-color mode: the white light will stay on, get color image all the timeSmart mode: the white light will only turn on when motion is detected Where to Detect Motion in? It's Your Call Define specific areas to focus on what matter most to you such as entryways, windows, or valuable items. You'll only be notified of important events and get event recordings within your chosen zones. Customize It to Fit Your Lifestyle Want to make sure your camera is only detecting during certain hours of the day? No problem! This feature lets you customize your detection timeline with ease. Hear and Speak to Your Loved Ones or Fur-kids The two-way voice feature is like your own personal walkie-talkie. Whether it's to check if your pets are causing trouble or to tell your kids to clean up their room, the possibilities are endless.

Feel Like You're Missing Out On Important Moments? Dual Storage Options For Peace Of Mind Insert an 256GB SD card for 3-weeks loop recording. The indoor home camera will continually save over old data, so you’ve always got the most recent of recording.Cloud storage (need subscription) is the go-to option if you want to store more of your footage and keep them safely stored in cloud. Get Family&Friends Involved With iSeeHome app, you can share you living room camera feed with your loved ones and keep an eye on your pets, kids, or anything else together. Want to give your neighbor access only during certain hours? No problem! You can customize the sharing permissions and duration in our app.

Find The Right Camera For You - JAIOT WiFi Indoor Security Cameras Top Pick-2.4GHz Only Add to Cart Budget Pick-2.4GHz Only Add to Cart New Pick- 5GHz&2.4GHz Add to Cart Higher Resolution- 2K Add to Cart Price $11.99$11.99 $25.99$25.99 $17.99$17.99 $20.99$20.99 WiFi Connection 2.4GHz WiFi Only 2.4GHz WiFi Only 2.4GHz/5GHz WiFi 2.4GHz/5GHz WiFi Resolution 1080P 1080P 1080P 2K/3MP Detection Type Motion Only Motion Only Motion Only Motion, Human Night Vision Type IR; Full Color; Auto IR; Full Color; Auto IR; Full Color; Auto IR; Full Color; Auto 2-way Audio ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Power 5V 1A adaptor and USB-C cable 5V 1A adaptor and USB-C cable 5V 1A adaptor and USB-C cable 5V 1A adaptor and USB-C cable Item 1 camera 2 cameras 1 camera 1 camera

Why does Wi-Fi configuration fail during the setup process? Does it support 5Ghz Wi-Fi? ( No ) No. This indoor camera requires a 2.4 Ghz Wi-Fi signal for setup. It does not work with 5 Ghz Wi-Fi signal. Make sure your Wi-Fi password is correct and there is no special symbol like “%” in your Wi-Fi name and password. Can this camera be used outdoors? ( No ) No. This JAIOT camera is not suitable for use in courtyards or any outdoor spaces. It should only be used indoors to ensure its proper functioning. Can I use this indoor camera without purchasing cloud storage? ( Yes ) Yes, you can use this 1080P camera with a 256GB SD card (not included) for 3 weeks 720P backup. Cloud storage is the go-to option if you want to store more of your footage and keep them safely stored in cloud. Can I mount the camera on a wall and adjust its angle? ( Yes ) Yes. Mounting screws kit and 3M tape are included for installation. This plug-in camera is not a Pan-Tilt camera. It can be adjusted left&right for 90° and straight up and down for 135°. Why does It says this is a wireless cam but still need plug in? （Get to know the meaning of "wireless" ) Conventional cameras generaly need two kinds of cable, power cable and signal cable. Here "wireless" means no signal cable, but still need the power cords for wireless camera power supply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for live view
reviews.reviewText: I had purchased a blink doorbell camera because I can't see the driveway of my house and the front door isn't mine. I like to watch for deliveries so they don't bother the front tenant. I was very unhappy with that camera as without a subscription, Amazon has made it all but useless as it won't stay on live view for anything. I bought this camera for much less. The setup was very easy. It literally talks you through it. They're was no buffering like the blink camera had and it just works. The night vision makes it so you can view the camera at night easily and you can also view the camera from anywhere via the app. The picture quality is very good. It defaults to SD but you can change it to HD with the touch of a button. I wish it would stay on HD but if that's the only issue it's fine. This camera is well worth the money but remember it works on 2.4 Wi-Fi only so make sure your phone is connected to it before you start

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s very good camera and size😎
reviews.reviewText: Man I’m going to tell you that I have been through many cameras and I mean a lot and this camera took my spot and filled the stress ball for overall and optimal performance of security cameras. They are small square and they turn 180 deg ☝️👎👈👉(u,d,r,u) full motion and app setting galore with great cloud service and micro sd. Picture: sd, hd, enhanced HD, security at finest and motion ai detection wonderful! Take this chance..I got 4 probably get 4 more!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Wired indoor camera with decent video quality
reviews.reviewText: Of course, like most, I like that this indoor camera was listed for a great price (with the discount I ended up paying around $11,) but you get what you pay for. You either have to purchase an SD card, or pay $7/month for motion detected cloud storage of your footage. The app that you have to use to access the feed is decent, but working in the tech field, I don’t know how much I would trust the cyber security of this app. With anything wired, the cord is of course annoying, and doesn’t look very elegant. On a budget, I would recommend using it, but if you’re looking for something more secure with better feed and features, I would pay the extra money for a better one. I’ve attached one photos of the camera itself, with the cord attached, and a screen snip of the live footage so you can take a look at the video quality. All in all, it does what it’s supposed to do, and advertised to do, but the quality of the product is what you’d expect for $11.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Read the description
reviews.reviewText: Horrible camera. It supposed to come with a month service. It says it’s working, it’s not, I get still pics, no video. I even put a card in it thinking that would help… nope, it won’t read ANY. Card I put in it. Completely worthless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars IT DOES THE JOB
reviews.reviewText: The Image Quality and sound quality are very good. It was extremely easy to install. The value of the product was worth it. I like the quality of the product as well. The ONLY THING that disturbs me is the it is supposed to have COLOR NIGHT VISION but it doesn't work and I can't see anything at night..... now in daytime you can see as clear as day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, no issues
reviews.reviewText: It works great. I like how you can check on it with multiple devices . It has video storage.. For a set price a month you can get extra storage.. The sensitivity is crazy good.. I had to turn mine Down because dust falling would set it off lol I also like how you can talk through it , Kind of like a walkie talkie or baby monitor... and the night vision Is really good.. has to have wifi to work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The camera itself is decent quality especially for the price but, I bought this thinking it was a wireless camera which it’s not. It might be wireless if you have a sim card but the camera did not come with a sim card either, that means I cannot play back the recordings. The camera should at-least come with a card. It was kind of difficult to connect to my wifi but eventually I got it to work. Unfortunately this is what I expected for the price. Although it doesn’t come with a component that’s necessary and isn’t wireless it has decent quality and works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is really nice. Bought 3. Fast set up.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super easy set up, great quality, nice app
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a Christmas present for my fiancée and he loves it!! Using it for monitoring geckos throughout the day. He can access cameras even when not connected to the house internet!! Night vision is 10/10 resolution and the night vision light is not bright. Super easy mounting with a sticky pad, buying him another one next week!!

it has a good quality in terms of night vision and motion detection. I want to use it as a security camera at the front door. I will update this review after 1 month or so to see how it is performing.
